name: MEC Adanac Tights - Men's
description:
Speaking technically, these tights aren’t waterproof like shell pants. Speaking practically, our members have loved them for years for commuting through rainy weather. The fabric is highly water-resistant, comfortably breathable, and stretches to let you plough through puddles.Fabric is circular knit for 4-way stretch, laminated to a non-porous hydrophilic film for water resistance.DWR treatment enhances water repellency and breathability.Seams are not taped.Elastic waist with drawcord.Articulated knees for a great fit and ease of movement.Ankle zips have reflective trims for night-time visibility.Back pocket has an invisible zipper.

Regular rise



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
